name: Glass Mosaic: Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
An artist lives in everyone! Unleash your creativity with a free multiplayer brain-teasing sensation Glass Mosaic: Original Jigsaw Puzzle. Create your own stained-glass masterpieces using variously shaped pieces of sparkling glass. This game will provide you with hours upon hours of fun, especially, while competing with other players online. Download this game to get involved into the breath taking art puzzle challenge!

Features:

- Play this colorful entertaining puzzle online for free!
- Creativity for everyone
- Tackle 170 puzzles in the full version
- Work out your way to win in multiplayer mode

Each puzzle consists of a colored grid of different shapes. Your task is to utilize sparkling pieces of glass fitting them on the proper places of a layout. Get rid of useless pieces using Trash Box. You win if the picture is completed faster than your opponent's one. Traditionally, as you progress, solving levels becomes much harder. Get tons of great pictures to complete, new pieces shapes and pattern layouts in the full version of Glass Mosaic: Original Jigsaw Puzzle. Experience world mosaics online taking your place among the greatest mosaic artists. Creativity for everyone!
